While meant for installations, can introduce malicious components if tampered with.
Meant for updating software, but can be crafted to modify installations maliciously.
Contains changes to be applied to a Windows Installer package. Can be used maliciously to modify software installations.
Used to distribute Windows updates or hotfixes. If maliciously crafted, can introduce harmful changes to the system.
Used to configure settings on Windows devices. If malicious, can modify system settings.
Can execute Java code when opened with Java Runtime Environment, if installed.
Can make changes to the Windows Registry. Malicious edits can compromise system integrity or security.
Can point to and execute malicious applications or scripts. Can also have embedded harmful arguments or actions.
